  Learning new things daily

Google Analytics API

I have been spending a lot of time thinking and prototyping REST services lately. As Dare points out, Google has a very impressive stack already available.

I was sending Jason an email about the Tattletale work his army is working on this summer and I mentioned something about Google Analytics when a thought hit me…Where is the Google Analytics API? Is it going to happen? Soon? They have API’ed everything else, I have to imagine we will see this soon (would be even cooler if we could re-use some of those nifty charts). Anyone with an inside scoop on this?

Posted on May 29, 2007 and tagged as google, rest, google-analytics
